object_name.value: Validate selected document has an Effective CURRENT version available.

title.value: This condition verifies if the selected document has an Effective CURRENT version available.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
Selected document has current Effective version already exists and hence cannot be reinstated to Effective.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc(all) where i_chronicle_id = '$value(i_chronicle_id)' and a_status='Effective' and any r_version_label = 'CURRENT')
